Package com.grocery.ordering.service

Class OrderService

java.lang.Object
com.grocery.ordering.service.OrderService
@Service @Transactional public class OrderService extends Object
Service layer for Order operations Implements business logic and validation
Author:
Chirag Singhal (chirag127)
